Does the reconciler access the error tick support?
In this case it would have to be made thread save.

The error tick labelprovider updates outliner images using the annotation model.

moving to KUM
*** Bug 12847 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

a fix was put in into 0409. The fix requires copying of a set and there are 
performance concerns. Leaving open to investigate into the performance concerns.
This does not seem to be a performance issue. Closed.
